title: Map Skins
body:
Hey, I'm new to the boards. I was just curious as to whether or not you allow the use of map skins. I've been wanting to use a Christmas skin but you guys tend to not give us one until the holiday season rolls around :/ 

P.S. Not sure if it matters but it's a recreation of the holiday map you gave us for 2016. Thanks!

replies.body: We don't support third party programs or custom skins.  We aren't banning it for it, but that can change.  We also can't assist you if you run into tech issues as a result, or if malicious apps are hiding inside them.  Check our[ third party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and just be safe!
